100.noListMessage: Mental health hearings are held in private and unless a request has been made by the patient for a public hearing a hearing list will not be published.
100.welshNoListMessage: Cynhelir gwrandawiadau iechyd meddwl yn breifat ac oni bai bod y claf wedi gwneud cais am wrandawiad cyhoeddus ni chaiff rhestr gwrandawiadau ei chyhoeddi.
